ProductOverview.Summary: openIMIS is a versatile open source software which supports the administration of health financing and social protection schemes. It is specially designed to manage the complex, high-volume data flows which are required to operate such schemes by seamlessly integrating beneficiary, provider, and payer data in a single platform.
ProductOverview.Users: Scheme operators (payer), hospital administration (provider), field staff (facing beneficiaries)

Reach.SummaryOfReach: More than 10 million people in eight countries benefit from health insurance, employment injury insurance, cash transfer, and voucher schemes managed using openIMIS. The openIMIS initiative has been working with scheme operators of various scheme types, from health and accident insurance to unconditional cash transfers, since 2016.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.  The scores for Inclusive Design, Climate Resilience and Low Carbon are not available as this assessment was done using the previous version of the maturity model.

Sustainability.Description: The major source of funding comes from a joint initiative of the Swiss and the German governments.  OpenIMIS also sees increasing support from international organizations such as WorldBank, the European Union and ENABLE from Belgium that are willing to sponsor OpenIMIS implementations in countries.
